summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4280 for the improvement of East 81st Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to 10th Avenue Northeast; by the construction of watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 50875, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
